introduction.p: This control template is for <Label/>. Windows and menus also use <Label/> in theme ShortcutKey to display awaiting key input after TAB is pressed.

prop.name: TextColor
prop.p: This property defines the color of the text.

prop.name: DefaultTextColor
prop.p: This property defines the default color of the text for the control. When there is no customization to the control, this property will be copied to TextColor.
